reviews.sentence: Fantastic Hotel. Fab hotel and staff are amazing. Clean smart quiet rooms comfy bed great attentive staff. Would definitely go back and highly recommend this hotel.
Good. Good room service nice pool. Under construction still can tell that this is under new management. Need to work out the kinks.

Beautiful place great ameneties. We arrived at 4 pm and our room was not quite ready but they offered complimentary drinks while we waited. The bellman took our bags and stored them while we went to the bar but our room was ready only about 10 minutes later. We were upgraded to a junior suite which added a small room with a couch and an additional TV along with a partial ocean view. There are TONS of restaurants within walking distance and the beach is right outside your back door. We got a great deal with grand opening prices so the stay was well worth it. They do charge 40 for valet and good luck if you decide to self park around 25. Close to the beach and restaurants Maxines Starbucks is only a couple of blocks away great location Better signage to differentiate between the three hotels that are really close to each other. It was difficult to tell where to pull in.

Short stay on arrival from uk. Hotel very relaxing ambience. Tastefully decorated. Service excellent. Staff helpful and always smiling. Beach area very clean. Comfortable bed and lovely white fluffy towels could not believe all the added extras on our final bill. People should be aware of the resort taxes and beach use. Also breakfast not included aprox an extra 80 on our final bill.
Excellent. Good location close to the beach restaurants and shops.

Georgeous rooms and great location. Beautiful rooms great pool and easy access to the beach. Excellent restaurant choices walking distance from the hotel. Espresso machine in the room was a nice touch. Parking can be tricky but there are a few city garages close by.

Gorgeous Hotel Excellent. The hotel staff checked us in early and were very accommodating. The entire hotel was beautiful and a very very short walk to the beach which was also beautiful. The hotel staff were willing to help with anything. The decor the pool and the location of the hotel. The hotel lobby bar was awesome and the bartender Evan was one of the bests bartenders ever. The hotel is located in the heart of Miami. We were able to walk almost anywhere we were going.

Not a bad choice but. Nice hotel great location great pool with direct access to our he beach. Well appointed rooms but no storage in the bathroom hence the toiletry bag goes on the floor which is less than idealThe one very disappointing thing was the service. Except on a couple of occasions it was very average the worse being the restaurant. Actually the service is quite bad everywhere in South Beach. The crowd in the hotel was more on the party side which could make the pool area very loud and not so relaxing at times. Note you get two chaises on the beach but the umbrella is extra 19 a day which I found schocking. The umbrella by the pool is free why should we pay for one on the beach. it is like renting a car by put the wheels are extra. it is a very pleasant hotel overall design wise and location is good You are walking distance to Lincoln Rd SERVICE especially at the restaurant.

Exceeded our expectations. Young couples will love it hear. Everything. If you are looking at similar priced hotels and can not choose book this one. Super friendly service unlike the rest of Miami. everything was clean and neat. They even checked us in a little earlier cause we arrived on an early flight. Pool side was lovely special that is to towel guy Lot who gave us lovely service by the pool. Close walk to city centre beach on your doorstep bikes available for loan. Drinks and food is a little pricey grab a bit in town.

Beautiful hotel with a few small disappointments. Beautiful hotel with beautiful amenities. Great location. We traveled to South Beach for my boyfriends birthday. I called the hotel to let them know and asked them to do something special when we arrived. When we got there I asked the woman who checked us in if there was a note on my reservation. She said they would bring some white wine and strawberries to our room but it never happened. It did not ruin the stay or anything and my boyfriend did not even know he was missing anything. It was just a little disappointing. Couple times we called to the front desk to get our car from valet and they forgot to relay the message to valet so we waited around a little longer than necessary.

I am not giving a perfect 55 in most areas because on my first day I had to request to have the room cleaned at 3 pm although I had been out since early in the am. In addition the valet took well over a half hour to retrieve my car in one instance. The other two times it only took the 15 minutes that it is supposed to. In all other respects the staff was great hotel was nice and clean and the location is phenomenal.

A very good experience. With a little twist they could turn it into a great one unbeatable. All in all the hotel is alright. Compared to other structures I would say it is quite good. Position the pool and the better be superior quality. But alas this seems to be a common thing in Miami ie paying 20 bucks for a sandwich made with industrial bread from Publix what can you doService could be improved it is sometimes slow and kind of messy by the pool. The quality of the food could be better too if you spend 40 for two omelettes and.
Exceptional. The bathroom could have had a little more space. Apart from that everything was perfect.

Exceptional. Alex Ubei made our stay go from amazing to beyond exceptional. He seemed to be working a double shift considering how often he was at the front desk. He brought a level of customer service to this hotel that helped make it feel like the 5 star place it is from late checkout to parking issues to everything in between. Also the decor quiet secluded like atmosphere and saltwater pools and private beach make it a great couple ’s resort.

This was one of the nicest hotel splurges we have ever had. We loved the view of the pool ocean. The view from our room was nothing short of spectacular. We had a room that overlooked the pool and ocean loved it. We loved the free use of the bikes and to take a nice ride along the beach. All drinks and snacks in the room were crazy expensive. Everyone loves freebies especially fresh baked cookies or small bottle of wine cheese crackers or some other little touch consider including a few of these. The fee to use the pool and beach chairs was a bit of a shock though the concierge by the beach was friendly and helpful.

Would n’t stay here again. Location. The rooms are very small and the shower height was so short my husband barely fit. The rooms need a major update. The floors were all cracked. The bathroom sink was cracked and so worn out. They do n’t have heaters in many rooms so we had to change rooms and even then they did n’t work right. The doors slam so loud forget sleeping in or relaxing. That is n’t a difficult fix. You can hear the people talking in the room next to you because walls our thin. They had a fully stocked bar however a bag of nuts expired in a few weeks. Not convinced that glasses that were used were actually being exchanged for clean ones. No where on housekeeping ’ cart was there room for clean glasses.

Good. After being upgraded the room was lovely. Original room was not suitable for 3 people. Service in the restaurant bar pool and reception was extremely slow waiting on average 15 mins before anyone acknowledged you and then waiting a further 1520 mins for a menu to be brought very poor slow service. Had to request 3 times for the futon to be made up and when done it was not complete no sheets or pillows.
Downgraded us charged us 450 TWICE. We waited from 930am to 5 pm just to get a room not even the one we booked horrible experience. Dirty robe in room. Blood on pillow in room.
Cute quaint hotel. It does a great job of joining guests with the local scene by means of activities and activations.

Like most of the reviews state this hotel has its pros and cons. Unles you get a very cheap rate I would n’t recommend. The pool staff is nice and friendly and works hard. Otherwise the hotel staff is lazy and does n’t care about their guests. We had to constantly call housekeeping to get daily cleaning service for our room. They would n’t show up until 5 6pm every day even when we requested an early cleaning. Honestly stay further north on the beach. This hotel lacks service and probably needs new management.
